resources.string: To see if there are any planned roadworks on a given street please enter a road name below.
Please enter a date below to find any planned roadworks occurring in that period.

Welcome, this application is designed to help you find traffic incidents across Scotland, both those that are happening right now and those that are scheduled to occur. Please select a button below to start.
To see more details about incidents or roadworks please click an item in the list.
